pr_title: Consolidate validation for GET&POST /route, clean up GHRequest#heading

timeline.message: Apply same checks for both GET&POST /route, clean up GHRequest#heading stuff

timeline.bodyText: @michaz for a moment I was tempted to set this to @NotEmpty with a custom error message, but then I thought its more consistent to do this later so its the same for GET&POST. But @NotNull cannot hurt, because by default I like to assume that nothing is null (for example when I later use the GHRequest).
timeline.author: easbar
